docTitle.titlePart:
GIPSY: Automated Geographic Indexing of Text
Documents

byline.affiliation:
California Department of Water Resources
and Computer Science Division
University of California,

Library and Information Studies
University of California,

front.reference: In: Journal of the American Society for Information Science, 45:9:645â€“655, 1994
front.div:
Abstract
In this paper we present an algorithm which automatically extracts geopositional coordi-
nate index terms from text to support georeferenced document indexing and retrieval. Under
this algorithm, words and phrases containing geographic place names or characteristics are
extracted from a text document and used as input to database functions which use spatial rea-
soning to approximate statistically the geoposition being referenced in the text. We conclude
with a discussion of preliminary results and future work.
